original_title: What to Do in a Zombie Attack
overview: A 1950s educational film on how to survive a Zombie Invasion. Part one explains how to be prepared and how to improvise. Part two explains what to do when you are bitten, and covers a brief history of the Zombie Menace. Part Three discusses what you can do for your country to help defend against the Zombie Menace.
title: What to Do in a Zombie Attack
